billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Removes sunset provisions of chapter 557 of the laws of 2001 relating to pre-need funeral services
summary: Removes the sunset provisions of chapter 557 of the laws of 2001 relating to pre-need funeral services.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          978

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. PHEFFER, SCHROEDER, GABRYSZAK, JAFFEE, GUNTHER,
         BENEDETTO, CLARK, COOK -- Multi-Sponsored  by  --  M.  of  A.  ABBATE,
         ENGLEBRIGHT, GOTTFRIED, HOOPER, LANCMAN, MAGEE, MAISEL, MARKEY, MAYER-
         SOHN, McENENY, J. RIVERA, P. RIVERA, ROBINSON, WEISENBERG -- read once
         and referred to the Committee on Consumer Affairs and Protection

       AN  ACT  to  amend  chapter 557 of the laws of 2001 amending the general
         business law, the public health law and the insurance law relating  to
         clarifying  provisions  pertaining  to  pre-need  funeral services, in
         relation to the effectiveness thereof

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section 6 of chapter 557 of the laws of 2001 amending the
    2  general business law, the public health law and the insurance law relat-
    3  ing to clarifying provisions pertaining to pre-need funeral services, as
    4  amended by chapter 78 of the  laws  of  2007,  is  amended  to  read  as
    5  follows:
    6    S  6.  This act shall take effect 30 days after it shall have become a
    7  law [provided, however sections 3 and 4 of this  act  shall  expire,  be
    8  deemed  repealed and shall cease to be of any force or effect after June
    9  1, 2012].
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately and  shall  be  deemed  to
   11  have been in full force and effect on and after December 12, 2001.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00723-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 557 of the laws of 2001 amending the general business law, the public health law and the insurance law relating to clarifying provisions pertaining to pre-need funeral services, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
